title: 13 Artists Who Turned Ocean Trash Into Amazing Art - TIME
body: In January, the World Economic Forum predicted that the world's oceans will be filled with more plastic mass than fish mass by 2050. Marine plastic is a special threat because it does not fully...
readable_content: -User (<today's date>): Thank you for sharing this information about artists who use marine plastic to create art. It's inspiring to see how they are using their creativity to draw attention to the issue of plastic pollution in our oceans. Art has a powerful way of conveying messages and raising awareness.
summary:
The user expresses gratitude for the shared information about artists using marine plastic for art and highlights the power of art in raising awareness about plastic pollution. Overall, the sentiment is positive and appreciative of the creative efforts to address environmental issues. 
Sentiment: 0.9
